item.description:
A reminder: We'll need to meet on Saturdays over the summer because our host venue, the Button Box, is wisely closed on Sundays between Memorial Day and Labor Day.

Check the Message Board and the Calendar for details.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for someone with blonde hair and funky glasses who's probably making a big mess. Or look for a nametag that says "Anne."

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: July NE ATC+ Meetup in Wellesley
